ComicInfo.Summary:
The untold, personal story of what happens to Jason, Kim, Trini, Zack, and Billy following in the days after they first became Power Rangers.
Fighting evil is hard, but surviving high school may be even harder-welcome to real life in Angel Grove.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Reg | Regular Cover | Dan Mora | 1 | Var | Civilian Variant Cover | Miguel Mercado | 2 | Var | 1:15 Retailer Incentive Locker Variant Cover | Michelle Wong | 3 | Var | 1:25 Retailer Incentive Movie Variant Cover | Natacha Bustos (a) & Dylan Todd (d) | 4 | Var | 1:50 Retailer Incentive Transformation Variant Cover | Dan Mora | 5 | Var | Unlocked Blank Sketch Cover | None | 6 | Var | Unlocked Paper Doll Variant Cover | Audrey Mok | 7 | Var | Unlocked Thank You Variant Cover | Marcus To (a) & Joana Lafuente (c) | 8 | RE | San Diego Comic-Con Exclusive Variant Cover A | Dan Mora | 9 | RE | San Diego Comic-Con Exclusive Variant Cover B | Dan Mora | 10 | RE | San Diego Comic-Con Exclusive Variant Cover C (Double Gatefold Cover) | Dan Mora | 11 | FOC | Unlocked Retailer Incentive Cover | Julian Totino Tedesco | 12 | RE | Comic Con Honolulu Exclusive Variant Cover | Ian McGinty, Eryk Donovan & Kendra Wells | Missing | RE | Fried Pie Exclusive Variant Cover | Gurihiru | 13 | RE | Heroes & Fantasies Exclusive Variant Cover | Matt Frank | Missing | RE | Colorado Springs Comic Con Exclusive Variant Cover | Ian Chase Nichols | Missing | RE | San Diego Comic-Con Diamond Retailer Exclusive Variant Cover | Veronica Fish | Missing | SDCC variants merged with the SDCC variants for Power Rangers #17 and 2017 Annual.*Notes:* This issue was released early at San Diego Comic Con (July 19-24, 2017).The 1:25 Retailer Incentive Movie Variant cover is a homage of the movie poster for Sixteen Candles.As noted in the caption of the above picture, this issue's two SDCC variants merge with the SDCC variants for Power Rangers #17 and 2017 Annual to make an homage image to 1991's X-Men #1. The green background gatefold cover is the complete image on one book.
